templates.author: Steve

parts.description: a camper convinced a witch is afoot

lines.line: No, that creepy cackling sound. It came from over there.
I distinctly heard mouth breathing. Kind of like (PANTS LINE A DOG)
Yes! That's it. (PAUSES DRAMATICALLY) I'm so scared.
Thank you for that. I hope the witch eats you.
Sorry, that was me. I just had cabbage.
Oh, sorry, yep. I hear it now. It is kind of like (PANTS LIKE A DOG)
(WHISPER SLOWLY) Me too. (SAM makes FLATULENT SOUND)

templates.scriptMarkup:
THE BLAND WITCH PROJECT

SETTING: a darkened room or a desolate outdoor area at night

CHARACTERS:

PAT, a camper convinced a witch is afoot

SAM, a nonbeliever

PAT

Did you hear that?

SAM

Sorry, that was me. I just had cabbage.

PAT

No, that creepy cackling sound. It came from over there.

SAM

I didn’t hear anything.

PAT

I distinctly heard mouth breathing. Kind of like (PANTS LIKE A DOG)

SAM

Oh, sorry, yep. I hear it now. It is kind of like (PANTS LIKE A DOG)

PAT

Yes! That’s it. (PAUSES DRAMATICALLY) I’m so scared.

SAM

(whispering, slowly)

Me too. (SAM makes FLATULENT SOUND)

PAT

Thank you for that. I hope the witch eats you.
templates.synopsis: Campers run afowl of a witch. Nobody is going home with all their dignity.
templates.title: The Bland Witch Project

templates.author: Steve
templates.scriptMarkup:
IT IS A KNOCK KNOCK JOKE

CHARACTERS:

KNOCKER 1, A knock-knock instigator

KNOCKER 2, A knock responder

KNOCKER 1

Knock knock.

KNOCKER 2

Who's there?

KNOCKER 1

Your face.

KNOCKER 2

My face who?

KNOCKER 1

I see your face.
templates.synopsis: You knock, I knock. Basically, knock-knock.
templates.title: It is a Knock Knock Joke
